raw_text:
Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 OVERVIEW Pro Line Fusion® Avionics System Description

• Tuning reversion control provides the ability to disable the AFD as the radio tuning source.

• Self-test modes are available for individual subsystems.

• Continuous self-monitoring of individual system units activates a system ﬂag when a fault is detected.

• The OMS captures detailed system LRU fault data.

5th Edition 02 APR 19 2-17

OVERVIEW Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 Pro Line Fusion® Avionics
